title: How animators and AI researchers made ‘Dear Upstairs Neighbors’
description: A movie poster for a film titled “Dear Upstairs Neighbors”, hand-painted in a vivid expressionist style, featuring an exasperated cartoon woman clutching her ears, surrounded by neon-colored images of noisy things like howling dogs and stomping shoes
